lead_paragraph: Sebastian Giovinco, the reigning MVP, scored on a penalty kick and had an assist in the second half, and Toronto FC beat the New York Red Bulls 2-0 on Sunday in a MLS season opener.

headline.print_headline: Giovinco Has Goal and Assist; Toronto FC Beats Red Bulls 2-0
headline.main: Giovinco Has Goal and Assist; Toronto FC Beats Red Bulls 2-0

snippet: Sebastian Giovinco, the reigning MVP, scored on a penalty kick and had an assist in the second half, and Toronto FC beat the New York Red Bulls 2-0 on Sunday in a MLS season opener....
